item.title: Morgan add a quote by Terry McMillan
item.description: "Too many of us are hung up on what we don't have, can't have, or won't ever have. We spend too much energy being down, when we could use that same energy – if not less of it – doing, or at least trying to do, some of the things we really want to do." -- Terry McMillan

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon
item.description: "And by the way it's not about making money, it's about taking money. Destroying the status quo because the status is not quo. The world is a mess and I just need to rule it." -- Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Jenny Joseph
item.description: "When I am an old woman I shall wear purple. With a red hat which doesn't go, and doesn't suit me." -- Jenny Joseph
